credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Six Studies of Soldiers' Heads
medium: Recto: Graphite on cream wove paper; verso: Graphite, brown and gray crayon(?)
description: Six studies of soldiers' heads; three across top and bottom. Four corner heads wear same hat with circular, flat top; those in upper left and lower right have "28" on hat.  Soldier in lower row center wears Zuave headdress.  Verso: standing woman with long hair, in profile, wearing cloak and hat. Several upside-down heads sketched at top of page.
name: Drawing
